version_description:
- With the help of user reviews, some of the names of the pictures were improved.

We hope you enjoy playing logic number puzzles! Discover picture puzzles from different categories.

We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback, why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with Nonogram!

- 210 new pictures were added to the game library. New puzzles are waiting for you!

We hear your feedback, and we are planning to add new content regularly - look out for updates!

We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback, why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with Nonogram!

- We have fixed the lines overlap on the small screens on Hard level!

We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback, why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Stay sharp with Nonogram!

- Now you can remove ads and enjoy playing logic number puzzles with more pleasure!

We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback, why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with Nonogram!

- Daily Challenges have been added for a given month, and by completing them users can get unique trophies.
- Performance and stability have been improved.

We have carefully reviewed all your comments and have made the game even better. Please provide feedback as to why you love this game and what else you would like to see improved. Keep your mind active with Nonogram!

- 480 new Nonogram puzzles have been added to the game. These new pictorial crossword puzzles are waiting for you to solve!
- We have improved the performance of the toggle at the bottom of the game for the colouring mode and the cross mode. Now you can just tap on the toggle to switch it.
- The animation quality has been streamlined. New animations have been added.
- We have added an Auto Lock Screen setting! Now you can enjoy solving these logic puzzles all day long!
- Performance and stability improvements

We read all your reviews carefully to make the game even better for you. Please leave us some feedback, why you love this game and what you'd like to improve. Keep your mind active with Nonogram!

- 120 new pictures were added to the game library. New puzzles are waiting for you!
- We have added Haptic Feedback. If you wish, you can turn it off in the settings.

The list of the improvements that have been made with the help of player feedback:
- We have improved the toggle mode performance, and now the switcher mode is working correctly.
- Magnetism by painting has been added, and the squares will stand even if your finger is off the line.
- Now it is possible to color the squares from the filled ones not only from the empty squares.
- We have corrected the spacing between numbers, now "11" doesn't look like "1&1".
- Width of the 5x5 grids on the game field has been increased, it will be easier to count the squares that need to be colored.

We are getting ready to present the new feature in the game, that will improve control accuracy and it will reduce the misclicks on the wrong square. We are working hard to improve the quality of the game, and to make our game even better. Stay tuned for further updates. Keep your mind active with Nonogram!

- 120 new Nonogram puzzles were added to the game. New griddlers are waiting for you!
- Performance and stability improvements
